metadata.title: Deploy Consul servers overview
metadata.description: Learn about the process to deploy Consul servers and find guidance for runtime-specific resources for deploying servers on virtual machines, Kubernetes, and AWS ECS.

mdxSource.compiledSource: const layoutProps={};const MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components,...props}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...props,components:components,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`This topic provides an overview of the processes involved in deploying a Consul server agent and joining it to your control plane. The specific steps vary depending on your runtime or cloud provider.`),mdx("p",null,`For information about how to deploy Consul client agents or dataplanes, refer to `,mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"/consul/docs/deploy/workload"},`Configure Consul workloads for your dataplane`),`.`),mdx("h2",{"id":"introduction"},mdx("a",{parentName:"h2","className":"__permalink-h","href":"#introduction","aria-label":"introduction permalink"},`\xbb`),`Introduction`),mdx("p",null,`Consul server agents are the backbone of a Consul deployment.`),mdx("p",null,`The basic process to deploy the first server agent in a cluster consists of the following steps:`),mdx("ol",null,mdx("li",{parentName:"ol"},`Create a Consul server configuration with bootstrap mode enabled.`),mdx("li",{parentName:"ol"},`Start the Consul server.`),mdx("li",{parentName:"ol"},`Configure access to the Consul server with the CLI or HTTP API.`)),mdx("p",null,`The process to deploy additional server agents in a cluster consists of the following steps:`),mdx("ol",null,mdx("li",{parentName:"ol"},`Update the `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"li"},`retry_join`),` stanza of the server agent configuration with the address of the bootstrapped server agent.`),mdx("li",{parentName:"ol"},`Start the Consul server agents using the updated configuration.`),mdx("li",{parentName:"ol"},`Verify cluster members with the `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"li"},`consul members`),` command.`),mdx("li",{parentName:"ol"},`Remove the servers from bootstrap mode.`)),mdx("p",null,`After you deploy it, you must secure a Consul cluster to prepare it for production environments. Refer to `,mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"/consul/docs/secure"},`Secure Consul`),` for more information about Consul's security model.`),mdx("h3",{"id":"automatic-agent-discovery"},mdx("a",{parentName:"h3","className":"__permalink-h","href":"#automatic-agent-discovery","aria-label":"automatic agent discovery permalink"},`\xbb`),`Automatic agent discovery`),mdx("p",null,`You can configure the `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`retry_join`),` stanza so that when a Consul agent starts, it automatically joins a cluster. metadata.title: Consul by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Consul is a service networking solution to automate network configurations, discover services, and enable secure connectivity across any cloud or runtime.
